plot: Can really important things be told when talking with a cellular phone? A casual conversation, an everyday walk home, an instant lost in time that may be the most important moment for a boy and a girl.
title: Connecting People
plot_es: Can really important things be told when talking with a cellular phone? A casual conversation, an everyday walk home, an instant lost in time that may be the most important moment for a boy and a girl.
plot_en: Can really important things be told when talking with a cellular phone? A casual conversation, an everyday walk home, an instant lost in time that may be the most important moment for a boy and a girl.
